main.name: Ahmed Ali
main.description: Full Stack Developer, Graphic Designer & currently working as a freelancer. #React #Ethereum
main.bio: My name is Ahmed Ali, I'm a Full Stack Blockchain , Web Designer & Developer and a seasonal Graphic Designer with almost 2 years of experience in Ethereum Blockchain, Graphic Designing & Web Development using latest technology. I'm energetic and passionate and love travelling. Currently I'm working at corecis.org as a freelancer
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get assistance or anything else.

testimonials.text: Thank you so much, I enjoyed alot working on this project!

Ahmed is truly a super full stack blockchain dev. I appreciate his work and commitment to deliver above and beyond what is required of him. His input in building us a full Dapp on BSc is impressive, a smart contract without bugs or vulnerabilities. HIS COMMUNICATION IS top-notch and his understanding supered. He was very forthcoming that the additional work was outside his area of expertise, we will keep working together long term. I RECOMMEND HIM TO ANY PROJECT OR TEAM. IF YOU WANT THE BEST.

I am very impressed and very grateful! Ahmed is skilled at his work- not only with web3 application but web design and overall UI support. I will definitely be using his work again and highly recommend!
